content: Why on earth does people wanna attack Jewish? Doesn’t make any sense. I understand gay, Muslim, black and others. but Jewish? Seriously? American is really damn stupid and afraid of everything -_- This is fucked up. P.S. attacking others are wrong as well. I am just surprise…well…not surprise….just dumbfound…that american, the land of the free, are happy to do these kind of things. pathetic.
